channel.title: 07League - Need Website Developer
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r6lht.jpg[/img] [b]Uhhh lol dont mind the size, sorry!! lol[/b]
It used to be runesmoke, but i changed it to 07league because runesmoke has nothing to do with 2007 lol.
Base: Cleaned PI (Dont hate, read how much shit i fixed :D)
Information/Features: (I cant remember all the updates i did, so im just listing the ones off the top of my head)
Wrote mining Wrote woodcutting Wrote fishing Wrote agility Slayer (was already in, I may rewrite) Farming (already in, may rewrite) Crafting (already in, may rewrite) Cooking (already in, may rewrite) Theiving (already in, WILL rewrite) 100% combat based on ticks Your defense level actually affects what your opponent hits Added all foods and potions from scratch Holiday event in progress (will be released only the first couple of days to get christmas crackers, only 1 cracker per IP) Explosive Pots Double doors Single doors Over 200 NPCS manually added to ensure correct spots :) I may have ocd... Writing to a text file 100% Varrock 99% Draynor 99% Lumbridge Run Energy Core work to max the server at LEAST 10x less laggy All known dupes have been 100% fixed All known bugs fixed Looping animations (so your mining animation doesnt stop halfway and your character keeps mining ...) Website is done, EXCEPT for accounts and forums
Pictures/Images: [img]http://i.imgur.com/gWFTi.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XQBwx.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zejz9k.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,549780.0.html]Development Thread (more pictures)[/url]
This project was created with a goal to simply become a legitimate remake and show everyone that 2006scape is a piece of shit, and never should be delayed by over 6 months. All of my progress has been done in under a month. (first backup was made June 3rd)
Now I need an experienced website programmer to create a "Create account" thing and also the forums. You will be paid depending on how many donations we receive (probably a lot)
Requirements to join: Website Developer - You must know how to create a fully functional login feature, with account storing, and ALSO build the forums.
To apply, use this layout:
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Website Developer ): How long have you coded?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?:

item.title: 07League - Need Website Developer
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:130, topic:446765”]Let me just put these definitions here so people can understand what this section is for:

Project - A whole team of people on a project trying to make it popular and functionally excellent. This includes the staff team, any financial backers, developers, advertisers, etc. We do not have a board for this at the moment, which we understand could make it confusing.

Development team - A team of developers that program and code a server. This includes only developers. To be honest you should be glad that we allow web development applications in this section, as the section is really about server development.[/quote]
I’ve removed the ‘advertiser’ part of your post, as that doesn’t fit into a ‘development team’.

Read full topic

item.title: 07League - Need Website Developer
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: The Web Guy / AJ
How old are you?: 15
E-mail address?: skill3d@live.com
What position do you want? (Website Developer or Advertiser): Website Developer
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Six years of HTML, CSS. And 5 Years of PHP and MySQL. I’ve done professional website design as a business the past two years.
What time zone are you in?: Central Time (GMT-6:00; If i’m right).
How long will you be on everyday?: I’m usually on all day, as i’m either on Skype, or working on my business stuff.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Looks like a very nice project, and seems to be going somewhere, just need a website as it appears to me.
Any Suggestions?: There isn’t much to suggest for the server/game as it’s already nice looking and everything seems good and all, however, it seems that you need a website, obivously. Haha, so let me know!

Read full topic

item.title: 07League - Need Website Developer
item.dc:creator: @CodeBest CodeBest
item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

r6lht.jpg1280×720

Uhhh lol dont mind the size, sorry!! lol

It used to be runesmoke, but i changed it to 07league because runesmoke has nothing to do with 2007 lol.

Base: Cleaned PI (Dont hate, read how much shit i fixed :D)

Information/Features: (I cant remember all the updates i did, so im just listing the ones off the top of my head)

Wrote mining
Wrote woodcutting
Wrote fishing
Wrote agility
Slayer (was already in, I may rewrite)
Farming (already in, may rewrite)
Crafting (already in, may rewrite)
Cooking (already in, may rewrite)
Theiving (already in, WILL rewrite)
100% combat based on ticks
Your defense level actually affects what your opponent hits
Added all foods and potions from scratch
Holiday event in progress (will be released only the first couple of days to get christmas crackers, only 1 cracker per IP)
Explosive Pots
Double doors
Single doors
Over 200 NPCS manually added to ensure correct spots I may have ocd…
Writing to a text file
100% Varrock
99% Draynor
99% Lumbridge
Run Energy
Core work to max the server at LEAST 10x less laggy
All known dupes have been 100% fixed
All known bugs fixed
Looping animations (so your mining animation doesnt stop halfway and your character keeps mining …)
Website is done, EXCEPT for accounts and forums

Pictures/Images:

gWFTi.png761×499

XQBwx.png760×502

2zejz9k.jpg757×498

Development Thread (more pictures)

This project was created with a goal to simply become a legitimate remake and show everyone that 2006scape is a piece of shit, and never should be delayed by over 6 months. All of my progress has been done in under a month. (first backup was made June 3rd)

Now I need an experienced website programmer to create a “Create account” thing and also the forums. You will be paid depending on how many donations we receive (probably a lot)

Requirements to join:
Website Developer - You must know how to create a fully functional login feature, with account storing, and ALSO build the forums.

To apply, use this layout:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:
How old are you?:
E-mail address?:
